description:
Spotcycle™ is a free multi-city GPS-enabled application that maximizes your bike-sharing experience. Track the statuses of bike stations around you and then pedal away to your next destination!

In addition to locating bike share stations, available bikes and docks, Spotcycle includes unique and cutting-edge features such as the Reality+™ overlay and convenient station clustering.

For tips, instructions and more info, head over to www.spotcycle.net.
 
Keep up to date with Spotcycle news by following our blog, on Facebook, or on Twitter @Spotcycle.

BIKE STATIONS LOCATIONS AND STATUS
•Locate bike stations on the bike share system.
•Automatically lists the 10 stations closest to your current location, or customize the number of stations to display.
•Filtered search function automatically lists the 10 stations closest to your current location that meet the filter criteria (available bikes, bike docks, or stations); adjusts the list dynamically as your location changes.
•Reality+ augmented reality overlay for locating bike stations in live view.
•Station clustering to make it easier to locate stations and bikes in a general area.

BIKE AND BIKE DICK AVAILABILITY
•Display the bike and bike dock availability for each bike station.
•Convenient pie chart icons indicate bike and bike dock availability.
•Search for stations by name, bike or bike dock availability.
•Displays the time of the last update.
•Search for stations by proximity to current location or to a place provided by Google Places.

MULTI-CITY SUPPORT
•Spotcycle supports the following multiple bike share schemes and bike paths in cities worldwide. Refer to the full list at www.spotcycle.net.

BIKE PATHS
•Toggle display of bike paths (where supported), bike stations or both with the layers feature.
•Displays bikes paths and lanes in supported cities.

LOCAL AMENITIES
•Optimize biking directions using an address, your current position, a bike station, or a point of interest.
•Search for local businesses provided by Google Places.

FAVORITES
•Bookmark your favorite bike stations
•Group stations into favorites for quick access.

LOCAL AMENITIES
•Optimize biking directions using an address, phone contact’s coordinates, your current position, a bike station, or a point of interest. 
•Search for nearby local businesses, such as restaurants and shops using Google Places.

TIMER AND ALARM
•Keep track of your bike rental with a timer and alarm

CUSTOMIZED SETTINGS
•Displays distances in metric or imperial
•Choose and customize your map views and pins
•Supports landscape mode
•Available in English and French

APPLICATION SUPPORT
•Easy email access to contact Spotcycle team and supported bike share schemes (when available)

SUPPORTED SCHEMES
Spotcycle™ supports the following popular bike-sharing schemes as well as many others. For the complete list of supported schemes, visit spotcycle.net.

Australia
•Melbourne, VIC (Melbourne Bike Share™)

Canada
•Montreal, QC (BIXI Montreal™) 
•Toronto, ON (Bike Share Toronto™) 

United Kingdom
•London (Barclays Cycle Hire™) 

United States
•Boston, MA (Hubway™) 
•Chicago, IL (Divvy Bikes™)
•Minneapolis, MN (Nice Ride Minnesota™) 
•New York City, NY (Citi Bike™)
•Seattle, WA (Pronto Cycle Share™)
•Washington DC/Arlington VA, USA (Capital Bikeshare™)
•Most DecoBike™ bike share schemes

NOTE: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

REQUIREMENTS
Requires iOS 7 or later; iPhone 4S or later; iPod 5th generation or later.
releaseNotes:
Resolved crash on upgrade issue
Refresh station data when the application resumes foreground activity.
